creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description:
scroll:  reproduction in black and white; portraits of standing and seated figures with text; most figures accompanied by male attendants--two figures accompanied by female attendants; original in poor condition, with many losses
print:  color image from scroll of man seated on a red throne, wearing a yellow garment, accompanied by two women; print rolled into scroll behind its matching image
title: Teio Zukan (Portraits of the Emperors)
